issue.title: Php Warning when basket is empty
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

On page index.php/component/easysdi_shop/?view=basket, if the basket is empty the following warning is raised :

Warning: Invalid argument supplied for foreach() in D:\htdocs\components\com_easysdi_shop\views\basket\view.html.php on line 60

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
